content.Description: The list of contact points to try connecting for cluster discovery.
The server-side port to open connections to. Defaults to 9042..
Keyspace will be the default keyspace for operations on the Session.
The username passed as a PlainTextAuthProvider username.
The password passed as a PlainTextAuthProvider password.
The earliest record date to sync.
Request timeout used when not overridden in Session.execute().
The local_dc parameter should be the name of the datacenter.
Floating point number of seconds to wait inbetween each attempt.
Should be a total number of attempts to be made before giving up.
The maximum version of the native protocol to use.
Config object for stream maps capability. For more information check out Stream Maps.
User-defined config values to be used within map expressions.
'True' to enable schema flattening and automatically expand nested properties.
The max depth to flatten schemas.
